Posts.Content: Hi all, Has anyone had the catheters put in while they were having there lumpectomy? The whole idea of quick effective treatment heck they can do the first one in the operating room Maybe Im kidding I want these little monsters dead and out of my body NOW!
Posts.Title: mamosite/brachyotherapy

Posts.Content: hello all Ive had an eventfull week and I'm confused by so many things. My family has a cancer history that makes me wonder if my grandparents lived in some type of toxic waste dump. Anyway, 3 of my paternal aunts had breast cancer but my sisters seem to universally be assured by there docs that we are not at an increased risk because it was paternal. Well my sister had bc last year and I was diagnosed this week. Considering that we now have a 30% cancer occurrance does anyone know of a good site where I could enlighten my sisters? Ok I know worring about this is a distraction but right now i need a distraction
Posts.Title: family history

Posts.Content: Hello all, I had my second biopsy wed. got the initial reports back and I have two masses with the same pathology the largest is 1.8cm. How fast does moderately invasive cancer grow? How hard do I need to push? The doctors seem happy to mosey along are they right? I don't know. Thanks All, Lorena
Posts.Title: timing
